atk-abh03a1:2_0: 1.Saṅgahoasaṅgahotiādīnañhi vasena idaṁ pakaraṇaṁ cuddasavidhena vibhattanti vuttaṁ.
atk-abh03a1:2_1: Taṁ sabbampi uddesaniddesato dvidhā ṭhitaṁ. Tattha mātikā uddeso. Sā pañcavidhā –
atk-abh03a1:2_2: nayamātikā, abbhantaramātikā, nayamukhamātikā, lakkhaṇamātikā, bāhiramātikāti. Tattha
atk-abh03a1:2_3: saṅgaho asaṅgaho…pe… vippayuttena saṅgahitaṁ asaṅgahitanti – ayaṁ cuddasahi padehi
atk-abh03a1:2_4: nikkhittā nayamātikā nāma. Ayañhi iminā saṅgahādikena nayena dhātukathā dhammā vibhattāti
atk-abh03a1:2_5: dassetuṁ ṭhapitattā nayamātikāti vuccati. Etesaṁ padānaṁ mūlabhūtattā mūlamātikātipi vattuṁ vaṭṭati.
atk-abh03a1:4_0: 2.Pañcakkhandhā…pe… manasikāroti ayaṁ pañcavīsādhikena padasatena nikkhittā abbhantaramātikā
atk-abh03a1:4_1: nāma. Ayañhi “sabbāpi dhammasaṅgaṇī dhātukathāya mātikā”ti evaṁ avatvā saṅgahādinā
atk-abh03a1:4_2: nayena vibhajitabbe khandhādidhamme sarūpato dassetvā dhātukathāya abbhantareyeva
atk-abh03a1:4_3: ṭhapitattā abbhantaramātikāti vuccati. Khandhādipadānaṁ dhammasaṅgaṇīmātikāya asaṅgahitattā
atk-abh03a1:6_0: 3.Tīhi saṅgaho, tīhi asaṅgaho; catūhi sampayogo, catūhi vippayogoti ayaṁ catūhi padehi
atk-abh03a1:6_1: nikkhittā nayamukhamātikā nāma. Ayañhi sabbesupi pañcakkhandhādīsu ceva kusalattikādīsu
atk-abh03a1:6_2: ca mātikādhammesu, tīhi khandhāyatanadhātupadeheva saṅgaho ca asaṅgaho ca yojetabbo.
atk-abh03a1:6_3: Tathā catūhi arūpakkhandhehi sampayogo ca vippayogo ca. Etāni imesaṁ saṅgahāsaṅgahādīnaṁ
atk-abh03a1:6_4: nayānaṁ mukhānīti dassetuṁ ṭhapitattā nayamukhamātikāti vuccati.
atk-abh03a1:8_0: 4.Sabhāgo, visabhāgoti ayaṁ dvīhi padehi nikkhittā lakkhaṇamātikā nāma. Ayañhi sabhāgalakkhaṇehi
atk-abh03a1:8_1: dhammehi saṅgahanayo, visabhāgalakkhaṇehi asaṅgahanayo, tathā sampayogavippayoganayo
atk-abh03a1:10_0: 5.Sabbāpi dhammasaṅgaṇī dhātukathāya mātikāti ayaṁ chasaṭṭhi tikapadāni, dve ca dukapadasatāni
atk-abh03a1:10_1: saṅkhipitvā nikkhittā bāhiramātikā nāma. Ayañhi “pañcakkhandhā…pe… manasikāro”ti
atk-abh03a1:10_2: evaṁ dhātukathāya abbhantare avatvā “sabbāpi dhammasaṅgaṇī”ti evaṁ dhātukathāya mātikato
atk-abh03a1:11_0: Evaṁ mātikāya pañcadhā ṭhitabhāvaṁ viditvā idāni ‘saṅgaho asaṅgaho’tiādīsu saṅgaho
atk-abh03a1:11_1: tāva jātisañjātikiriyāgaṇanavasena catubbidho. Tattha – “sabbe khattiyā āgacchantu,
atk-abh03a1:11_2: sabbe brāhmaṇā, sabbe vessā, sabbe suddā āgacchantu”, “yā cāvuso visākha, sammāvācā,
atk-abh03a1:11_3: yo ca sammākammanto, yo ca sammāājīvo, ime dhammā sīlakkhandhe saṅgahitā”ti ayaṁ
atk-abh03a1:11_4: jātisaṅgaho nāma. “Ekajātikā āgacchantū”ti vuttaṭṭhāne viya hi idha sabbepi jātiyā
atk-abh03a1:11_5: ekasaṅgahaṁ gatā. “Sabbe kosalakā āgacchantu, sabbe māgadhakā, sabbe bhārukacchakā
atk-abh03a1:11_6: āgacchantu”, “yo cāvuso visākha, sammāvāyāmo; yā ca sammāsati, yo ca sammāsamādhi,
atk-abh03a1:11_7: ime dhammā samādhikkhandhe saṅgahitā”ti ayaṁ sañjātisaṅgaho nāma. “Ekaṭṭhāne jātā
atk-abh03a1:11_8: saṁvaḍḍhā āgacchantū”ti vuttaṭṭhāne viya hi idha sabbepi sañjātiṭhānena nivutthokāsena
atk-abh03a1:11_9: ekasaṅgahaṁ gatā. “Sabbe hatthārohā āgacchantu, sabbe assārohā, sabbe rathikā āgacchantu”,
atk-abh03a1:11_10: “yā cāvuso visākha, sammādiṭṭhi, yo ca sammāsaṅkappo, ime dhammā paññākkhandhe saṅgahitā”ti
atk-abh03a1:11_11: ayaṁ kiriyāsaṅgaho nāma. Sabbeva hete attano kiriyākaraṇena ekasaṅgahaṁ gatā. “Cakkhāyatanaṁ
atk-abh03a1:11_12: katamakkhandhagaṇanaṁ gacchatīti? Rūpakkhandhagaṇanaṁ gacchatī”ti. Hañci cakkhāyatanaṁ
atk-abh03a1:11_13: rūpakkhandhagaṇanaṁ gacchati, tena vata re vattabbe – ‘cakkhāyatanaṁ rūpakkhandhena
atk-abh03a1:11_14: saṅgahita”nti, ayaṁ gaṇanasaṅgaho nāma. Ayamidha adhippeto. Tappaṭipakkhena asaṅgaho
atk-abh03a1:11_16: sampayogo, tappaṭipakkhato vippayogo. Tesaṁ vikappato sampayuttena vippayuttādīni.
atk-abh03a1:11_18: pana khandhavibhaṅgādīsu vuttanayeneva veditabbāni. Phassādayo panettha sanniṭṭhānavasena
